description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Mega Shooter 11™ is an extremely authentic, retro side-scrolling space-shooter, ala the best 8 and 16-bit space shooters. It features topnotch old-school graphics, a heart-thumping soundtrack, and intelligent game play. Spread over four huge bases with branching pathways, the game features tons of upgrades, hidden levels, enemies, and excessive amounts of replay value.
